instructions.notes: Add with carry to A, +indexed postbyte cycles
AND CCR then wait for interrupt, min 20 cycles
Long branch if carry clear (6 if taken)
Long branch if higher or same
Long branch if lower or same
Push registers to S stack (5+n per byte pushed)
Push registers to U stack (5+n per byte pushed)
Pull registers from S stack (5+n per byte pulled)
Pull registers from U stack (5+n per byte pulled)
Return from interrupt (6 if E=0, 15 if E=1)
